title: I AM ATHLETE | JOE BUDDEN and BRANDON MARSHALL Discuss Their Podcast Breakup
description:
SUBSCRIBE ➡️ https://www.youtube.com/c/IAMATHLETE?sub_confirmation=1

Don’t miss out on all the action this week at DraftKings!  Download the DraftKings Sportsbook app today! Sign-up using http://dkng.co/athlete or through my promo code ATHLETE

Media personality and former rapper Joe Budden joins Brandon Marshall, Adam "Pacman" Jones, and LeSean "Shady" McCoy and D.J. Williams in episode 48 of I Am Athlete. Watch this episode as Joe and Brandon dissect their podcast breakups and the challenges that come with being pioneers in the new media space.
